pages.text: Rockets can be fired from either a rocket launcher or dispenser. Setting a rocket on fire will create a fire explosion. There are a few variations:
The basic rocket makes a TNT sized explosion upon hitting the ground or an entity.
Uranium rockets have a larger explosion and leave behind a cloud of fallout.
The nuclear rocket is an Alex's Caves nuke in rocket form.$(br2)Nuclear rockets will set off nearby sirens. Dispensers will fire nuclear rockets with zero spread and faster speed as well.
If enabled in the config, rockets will use improved checking logic to avoid missing nether portals (due to high speed), allowing you to safely nuke others from another dimension :)
Neutron bomb in rocket form. Dispensers will fire neutron rockets with zero spread and faster speed as well.
